description: The student was absent on the day of the test
The student took another assessment OR this was a duplicate registration/attempt
The student is learning English and is in their first year in the U.S.
The student withdrew from the test before or during testing
The student refused to take the test
The student had a medical exemption for the test
The student is home schooled and attends public school part time
The student was excused from the test by a parent
